metadata.title: CVE-2022-21216 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Insufficient granularity of access control in out-of-band management insome Intel(R) Atom and Intel Xeon Scalable Processors may allow aprivileged user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via adjacentnetwork access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-21216` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20230214.0ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20230214.0ubuntu0.22.04.1').
